channel.title: Chinese on Zhanliang Liu
channel.description: Recent content in Chinese on Zhanliang Liu

item.title: gocc: Golang version OpenCC 繁簡轉換
item.description: Introduction 介紹 gocc is a golang port of OpenCC(Open Chinese Convert 開放中文轉換) which is a project for conversion between Traditional and Simplified Chinese developed by BYVoid. gocc stands for “Golang version OpenCC”, it is a total rewrite version of OpenCC by Go. It just borrows the dict files and config files of OpenCC, so it may not produce the same output with the original OpenCC. Installation 安裝 1, golang package go get github.
